title: Am I able to report recent players?
body: I recently played with someone who I believed to have an offensive username. I left post game without reporting by accident. I don't see anyway to go back and report this person. Is there anywhere on the website or support website I can report them at?

replies.body:
If you have their name, you can report their name in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our specialists.

Let me know if you have any questions.
